products_entries.full_product_description: SUPPLY & INSTALLATION OF PLC BASED DV CONTROL PANEL FOR FOAM SPRINKLER SYSTEM AND FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM INTERGRATION PANEL WITH PLC. Supply,Installation,Termination of cable,Testing and Commissioning of PLC Based Deluge Valve Control Panel with accessories. The panel should have local push botton switched for emergency operation from panel.Panel and associated accessories shall be designed to withstand environmental conditions at site.Panel in open areas shall be weatherproof to IP-65 as per IS/ IEC-60529. Canopy/Shed of adequate sizes shall be provided for each panel to protect from weather, the cost of the same shall be included in the panel cost.No extra payment shall be made for providing fixture , fittings & accessories. PLC Based DELUGE VALVE CONTROL PANEL should contain the following:- 1. Programmable Logic Controller. 2.Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator  with sounder. 3.UPS. 4.Cables (Power & Control) Specification of Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) : 1.Input Power: 24vdc,Redundant Supply. 2.Application capabilities with up to 7 expansion I/O modules for a maximum of 256 discrete I/O. 3.Up to 6 embedded 100 kHz highspeed counters (on controllers with dc inputs) 4.2 Serial ports with DF1/ DH485/Modbus RTU/DNP3/ASCII protocol support. 5.Ethernet port provides you with  EtherNet/IP, DNP3 over IP and Modbus TCP/IP protocol support as well as web server and email capabilities. 6.Built-in LCD with backlight allows you to view controller and I/O status, and provides a simple interface for messages, bit / integer monitoring and manipulation. 9.Memory:non-volatile battery backed RAM. 10.online editing:yes. 11.Operating Temp.:-20°C...+60°C. 12.Storage Temp:-40°C (or -30°C)...+85°C. Specification of Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator with sounder:  Window display shall be back lighted incandescent lamps or cluster LED type integral power supply. Specification of UPS: 1.Alarm Condition: 1 hours. 2.Standalone Condition: 4 Hours.
products_entries.core_product_name: plc based deluge valve control panel
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: system: foam sprinkler system and fire water pumping system integration, feature: local push button switches for emergency operation, feature: weatherproof to IP-65, standard: IS/IEC-60529 (indian standard/international electrotechnical commission), feature: canopy/shed for weather protection, feature: no extra payment for fixture, fittings & accessories, contains: programmable logic controller, contains: solid state or microprocessor based programmable alarm annunciator with sounder, contains: UPS, contains: cables (power & control), programmable logic controller input power: 24vdc, programmable logic controller supply: redundant, programmable logic controller expansion: up to 7 expansion I/O modules (max 256 discrete I/O), programmable logic controller counters: up to 6 embedded 100 kHz highspeed counters (on controllers with dc inputs), programmable logic controller serial ports: 2 (DF1/DH485/Modbus RTU/DNP3/ASCII protocol support), programmable logic controller ethernet port: EtherNet/IP, DNP3 over IP, Modbus TCP/IP, web server, email, programmable logic controller display: built-in LCD with backlight, programmable logic controller memory: non-volatile battery backed RAM, programmable logic controller online editing: yes, programmable logic controller operating temperature: -20°C...+60°C, programmable logic controller storage temperature: -40°C (or -30°C)...+85°C, alarm annunciator display: back lighted incandescent lamps or cluster LED type, alarm annunciator power supply: integral, UPS alarm condition: 1 hour, UPS standalone condition: 4 hours

products_entries.full_product_description: SUPPLY & ERECTION OF HMI PC Supply,Installation and Commissioning of HMI PC with all accessories complete in all respect and UPS of suitable capacity capable supply power for atleast 1 hour in Alarm Condition & 4 hours in Standalone Condition. (Two Sets of HMI PC shall be provided in two different Locations, one at Control Room/Security Cabin and another at Admin Block) Specification of HMI PC: 1.Site specific HMI software and provision for stimulation DV System. 2.HMI Software for one user with paper licence. 3.Harddisk:1TB. 4.RAM: 8 GB. 5.Display:21" LED. 6.OS: windows lateset professional version. 7.DVD drive  ± R/RW 16X. 8.Processor 32 bit Intel Xeon Quad Core Processor with  2.8 GHz. 9.Graphics NVIDIA Quadro 600 with 1GB video memory. 10.event history:min 1 month.
products_entries.size: harddisk: 1TB, ram: 8 GB, display: 21" LED, processor: 32 bit Intel Xeon Quad Core Processor with 2.8 GHz, graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 600 with 1GB video memory
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: supply: installation and commissioning, accessories: all, UPS: suitable capacity (1 hour alarm, 4 hours standalone), locations: control room/security cabin, admin block, software: site specific HMI software, stimulation DV system, HMI software for one user with paper licence, OS: windows latest professional version, DVD drive: ± R/RW 16X, event history: min 1 month
